page.title: 10DURHAM LEYS FARM
page.content: This farm is owned by Mr.Ronald Wells and his wife Nina. They have four children. Two of their sons,Bromley and Ronald, live in houses belonging to the farm, as does daughter Vanessa and her family. The farm owns six houses, one being rebuilt,is one of the oldest houses in Marsh Baldon. The Wells family came to Durham Leys Farm from Chiselhampton when Mr.Wells was a year old. Although officially retired,Mr. Wells still works on the farm, and delivers milk daily around the Baldons to 105 customers. The milk is bottled on the farm. He makes an early start, returns for his breakfast,then has a rest.After more farm work he has lunch,a rest,then more farm jobs. The farm owns 100 acres,more fields are rented for grazing. It is a mixed dairy farm with 32 cows and 50 'followers'.
